item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 26, 2025 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Steam Brick: No screen, no controller, just a power button and a USB port (286 points | 69 comments)
2. The South Vietnamese pilot who landed a Cessna on a carrier to save his family (2019) (50 points | 24 comments)
3. DeepSeek-R1: Incentivizing Reasoning Capability in LLMs via RL (524 points | 439 comments)
4. OpenRA – Classic strategy games rebuilt for the modern era (284 points | 56 comments)
5. An invalid 68030 instruction accidentally allowed the Mac Classic II to boot (158 points | 19 comments)
6. SQLook – A free online SQLite database manager with a Windows 2000 interface (39 points | 12 comments)
7. Searching for DeepSeek's glitch tokens (95 points | 9 comments)
8. Every HTML Element (204 points | 80 comments)
9. Chimera Linux works toward a simplified desktop (17 points | 9 comments)
10. Apache Iceberg (21 points | 5 comments)
11. Wikenigma – an Encyclopedia of Unknowns (90 points | 17 comments)
12. Immutability Changes Everything (2016) [pdf] (62 points | 16 comments)
13. Using AI to develop a fuller model of the human brain (47 points | 10 comments)
14. Bucket Robotics (YC S24) is hiring our first engineer ( | hide)
15. You probably don't need query builders (70 points | 58 comments)
16. Open Heart Protocol (178 points | 75 comments)
17. A FPGA friendly 32 bit RISC-V CPU implementation (91 points | 40 comments)
18. CIA now favors lab leak theory to explain Covid's origins (290 points | 341 comments)
19. Base-Rate Blindness (18 points | 8 comments)
20. Fault Tolerance in Tandem Computer Systems (1986)[pdf] (25 points | 17 comments)
21. Show HN: I built a DIY plane spotting system at home (163 points | 64 comments)
22. Dual-Link QR Code Generator (36 points | 13 comments)
23. An experiment of adding recommendation engine to your app using pgvector search (4 points | discuss)
24. Schrödinger: The Nvidia biotech partner Jensen Huang told to "think bigger" (34 points | 16 comments)
25. How far can you get in 40 minutes from each subway station in NYC? (236 points | 144 comments)
26. Show HN: Puck 0.18 adds drag-and-drop for CSS grid and Flexbox (33 points | 3 comments)
27. Show HN: Actionate – GitHub Actions for JetBrains IDEs (29 points | 10 comments)
28. Tool touted as 'first AI software engineer' is bad at its job, testers claim (51 points | 28 comments)
29. OpenAI's o1 Playing Codenames (208 points | 113 comments)
30. Texas Is Enforcing Its State Data Privacy Law. So Should Other States (69 points | 13 comments)
